system.description: An upgraded form of internal omnicomp, with assisted computing technology integrated into neural interface, which grants a +1 bonus to the characterâ€™s Computers skill. This technology makes it very capable of circumventing electronic security, potentially allowing for hacking and controlling simple wireless devices in close proximity. TL9+ computers and advanced devices are mostly safe against remote tampering in this fashion, but the hacking module still can help in hacking them over a wired interface.
system.shortdescr: Computers skill +1 and allows remote hacking of simple electronics nearby
